title: PS2 NTSC to PAL or PAL to NTSC converter
description:
Converts the picture format from NTSC to PAL and vice versa. It also adjust Y-FIX, so the screen will not come out crooked, or oblique. This program does not do ANYTHING, but finding the colour files, and convert them. This program has been a secret for some years now. All you have to do is to choose the iso file, Drag and Drop into this window, then press convert and it&#039;s done. But remember to take a backup, before you convert, so if things doesn&#039;t go right, you don&#039;t have to download it again.

This is a real program!!! IT DOES WORK! I know the size looks a wee bit weird, but you don&#039;t have to install this program, just click it and it will open.

Works on Win2000 and above (even Vista)
